summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing the execution of an agreement with King County for financial assistance in the amount of One Hundred Eighty Six Thousand Three Hundred Seventy Five Dollars ($186,375) to help address juvenile justice issues through expansion of the Seattle Team for Youth/Project RIDE program; accepting the money when received; increasing the 2000 Budget of the Police Department; ratifying and confirming prior acts; and making a reimbursable appropriation therefor; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
